mapper.sql: id, peopleid, pictureid, deviceid, capturetime, surl, burl, flag
mapper.select: select capturetime, deviceid, burl from t_people_recognize where DATE_FORMAT(capturetime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 30 DAY), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') and flag = 3 and peopleid = #{peopleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_people_recognize (id, peopleid, pictureid, deviceid, capturetime, surl, burl, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capturetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_people_recognize
id,
peopleid,
pictureid,
deviceid,
capturetime,
surl,
burl,
flag,

mapper.update:
update t_people_recognize
peopleid = #{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pictureid = #{pictureid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
capturetime = #{capturetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
surl = #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
burl = #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_people_recognize set peopleid = #{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictureid = #{pictureid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capturetime = #{capturetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, surl = #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, burl = #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
